docs.lead_paragraph: Prospects for a happy Christmas grew more dim yesterday for many of the Neediest Cases when contributions to the Fund again slumped as compared to the corresponding day last year.

headline.main: DEFICIT" GROWING IN AID TO NEEDIEST; Friends of Fund Must 'Dig a Little Deeper' if Goal Is to Be Attained. MANY ARE GIVING AGAIN Some Contribute for Third and Fourth Time -- Princess Mdivani Donates $2,500.

docs.snippet: Prospects for a happy Christmas grew more dim yesterday for many of the Neediest Cases when contributions to the Fund again slumped as compared to the corresponding day last year.

docs.lead_paragraph: REMEMBER THE NEEDIEST! Again, in this season of Christmas giving, the call goes out. For, though the response to the appeal in the last two weeks has been heartening, many more contributions must come if the Neediest of this year are to have the full measure of aid they require.

headline.main: REMEMBER THESE: THE NEEDIEST OF ALL; TWENTY-THIRD ANNUAL APPEAL
